Package co.acoustic.mobile.push.sdk.api

Class MediaManager.UpdateViewTask

java.lang.Object
co.acoustic.mobile.push.sdk.api.MediaManager.UpdateViewTask
All Implemented Interfaces:
MediaManager.OnImageLoadTask
Enclosing class:
MediaManager
public static class MediaManager.UpdateViewTask extends Object implements MediaManager.OnImageLoadTask
This class is a callback that updates the view once the image is loaded

    UpdateViewTask(android.app.Activity activity, android.widget.ImageView imageView)
    Generates a new update task with an image view and it's containing activity

  • Method Details

    • imageLoaded

      public void imageLoaded(String url, android.graphics.Bitmap image)
      This method is called when the image is loaded. It updates the image view with the image in the ui thread
      Specified by:
      imageLoaded in interface MediaManager.OnImageLoadTask
      Parameters:
      url - The image url
      image - The loaded image

    • imageLoadFailed

      public void imageLoadFailed(String url)
      This method is called if image loadoing fails. It does nothing
      Specified by:

      Parameters:
